column4: hello can i route the input of an keyboard to an file for example? or to /dev/null so it does not work?
cat > foo             then type, end with ctrl-D

no it is i made an "usb moving sensor" for an show computer so as soon somebody coming close "space" is hit by an radarsensor. monitor switch on. Then all the time space is pressed. and i want to route this input to an script.
